scripts.allure:clear: rimraf allure-results/* && rimraf allure-results-aggregated-files/* && rimraf allure-report/* && rimraf cypress/screenshots/* && rimraf cypress/videos/*
scripts.cypress: npm run allure:clear && npx cypress run --browser electron --spec cypress/e2e/test/test.spec.cy.ts --env allure=true && npm run allure:report
